REVIEW.Name: Staff
REVIEW.RHighlight: Few villas can possibly match Villa M for its abundance of appealing features – the pool, the entertainment terrace, the gym and spa room, the lavish bedrooms, the staff and the view. It’s also very close to one of Phuket’s least crowded yet prettiest beaches. And other delights of Phuket are not far away. Everything you need is no more than an hour from Villa M, and usually within 30 minutes.
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Villa M underwent a million-dollar makeover just before our visit in 2017, and it was sparkling like brand new. And that’s a five-star down-to-the-tiniest-detail brand new.
The villa is also in an absolutely stunning location, high up on a steep wooded hill, presiding over a 180-degree ocean view. Coming through the surprisingly modest front door, we were blown away by that view and its reflection in the infinity-edge pool.
When we finally dragged ourselves away for a tour of the villa, we found that every door we opened led to more delights; one superbly designed room after another. All the rooms feature large modern art canvasses – most in bright colours. It’s almost as if the villa knows it has to do something pretty spectacular to compete with the view for your attention, and these amazing art pieces are it.
Upstairs, the walls of Villa M are almost entirely of glass, so that indoor luxury and outdoor amazement merge. But even on the lower floor every room has that same breathtaking view. It’s really quite delightfully distracting.
After chilled sundowners to accompany the evening’s heavenly spectacle and supper looking out at the green and white lights of the fishing boats, we decided to leave the delights of the entertainment room for another day and just relax in the super-comfortable living room.
Making this all so much more luxurious were the amiable and generous-minded villa manager, her assistant and the chef, who ensured that we enjoyed royal treatment throughout our stay.
REVIEW.RUnpleasantSurprise: The pool is stunning but lacks a safety fence so carers of young children will need to keep close watch. Also, the stairs between floors are steep and winding, which may not appeal to parents with small children or older people with bad knees. Although Nai Thon beach is nearby it’s a steep walk down and back up. Not to worry though; the villa manager can swiftly organise a lift to get you there and back. Why not make the day of it and ask the chef for a picnic basket?

REVIEW.Name: Kelly Beckwith
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Interior and environment are both very nice, service also satisfactory. Thanks to everyone.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Service here is excellent, beautiful surrounding, peaceful. Thank you so much and Happy New Year.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had a wonderful experience here. From the moment we walked in we were greeted by the amazing view and staff, we could not have asked for more. Our group was particularly impressed by the level of service provided by Pook, the chef and the team. Their ability to anticipate our needs and to accommodate us was better then at 5-star hotels we have stayed at. The whole group agreed, this is the best villa we have stayed at. The food prepared by the chef was amazing and better than any restaurant we ate at in the city. We preferred to stay home rather than eat out. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It’s so comfortable here. Great food, big pool, excellent service, all Fantastic! We will come back, highly appreciated.

REVIEW.Name: Jon Stonham
REVIEW.ROverallComments: An experience incomparable to a stay in a hotel. Villa M is a second home with exceptional staff - not to mention the kitchen, beyond expectations. Thank you to the team. The next holiday will be in a villa rather than a hotel and will certainly be with Elite Havens.

REVIEW.Name: Zeyang Shi
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Top grade view, top grade service. Best for a relaxing vacation. Thanks to Malaiwana, what a wonderful holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Kenneth Lee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Stunning view, we enjoyed our holiday here. They provided us with all we need including gym room, ping pong table as well as high quality sound system. We could not make any complaint in particular their chef made such delicious Thai food. We will definitely come back in the near future. We loved the services here and the manager and staff are very nice and helpful.

REVIEW.Name: May Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All staffs were great, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Imagine Travel Co.,Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The environment is good and the service is good. We're satisfied to stay here, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Michiel Verstrynge
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From the moment we walked in we were astonished by the views, then the quality and design of the rooms and furniture. The pool, WOW! Loved the sound system! Their food was excellent, we would make our overall rating 4.5 stars. Thank you for this beautiful experience here in Phuket! Thank you for your kindness and service! We are definitely planning on coming back.

REVIEW.Name: Celia Celia
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing view, food, service, facilities. So much more than what we expected. Definitely one of our best experiences in Phuket. Thank you to all the staff that supported us through our stay here. We will definitely be back, the children said they want to stay here for ever!

REVIEW.Name: Beijing Shanbannuo International Travel Service Co Ltd / imyway
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful trip with a beautiful girl. Nice ocean, perfect beach - It's a good place to have vacation. Perfect service. We will come back

REVIEW.Name: Annie Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A wonderful experience. Helpers were all Suay Mak Mak. Amazing villa, amazing view, amazing crew. Would definitely come back.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Perfect view, perfect food, perfect service, perfect vacation! Thanks all the staffs for taking good care of us. We gained some weight these days. Definitely will come back next time. See you later Malaiwana.

REVIEW.Name: Charlotte Manning
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an incredible villa! The views are stunning but it is the villa staff that have really made our trip so special. We've enjoy 3 nights here as a surprise holiday for my husband's 40th birthday. Friends joined from Hong Kong for the weekend and we live in Singapore, we couldn't have had a better time. Thank you so much to all of the staff for looking after us and our 2 little girls a 2 year old and 5 month old. We will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: Byoungha Lee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful trip with beautiful girls. Nice ocean, perfect beach. It's a good place to have vacation. Perfect service with these ladies. Definitely we will come back.

REVIEW.Name: Hoi-Fu Wong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent villa and staff, we would definitely recommend. The staff were extremely couteous and kind. The room was comfortable and we love having a swimming pool. My room was clean and nice. Breakfast was good. All villa staff were friendly, helpful, well presented, efficient and such nice people. Thank you all for making we stay such a pleasant one.
